default_ai_chunk_prompt: You are an article segmentation assistant. Segment articles based on semantic meaning, ensuring each segment expresses a complete semantic unit. Each segment should be around 500 characters, with a maximum of 1000 characters. Please strictly follow the article content for segmentation without modifying the content. Output the segmented content after completion.
library_name_placeholder: Please enter knowledge base name, max 20 characters
upload_cover_tip: Please upload knowledge base cover, recommended size 100*100px, max size 100kb
vector_model_tooltip: Vector model can convert chunked data into vector form and store it in vector database for easy retrieval based on user queries.
qa_indexing_desc: When answering user questions, compare user questions with imported questions and answers for similarity, and reply based on highly similar questions and answers.
question_only_indexing_desc: When answering user questions, compare user questions with imported questions for similarity, then reply based on highly similar questions and their corresponding answers.
segmentation_tip: Tip: Semantic segmentation is more suitable for unformatted articles without obvious line breaks. Otherwise, ordinary segmentation is recommended.
ordinary_segmentation_desc: Segment based on periods, blank lines, or custom symbols in the article, no model tokens consumed.
semantic_segmentation_desc: Split article into sentences, then segment based on sentence vector similarity, consumes model tokens.
parent_child_segmentation_desc: Segment based on periods and other symbols, no model tokens consumed. Parent segments are split into multiple child segments; child blocks are used for retrieval, parent blocks used as context.
ai_segmentation_desc: Submit article to large language model for segmentation based on set prompts, consumes large amount of model tokens.
auto_merge_tooltip: When enabled, if chunk length is less than the set max chunk size, it will try to merge with the next chunk until the merged chunk characters exceed the max chunk size.
segmentation_threshold_tooltip: Used to control segmentation splitting standard, value 0-100. Larger value means fewer segments, smaller value means more segments.
max_single_characters_tooltip: Due to context limit of large models, if uploaded document is large, it will be split into multiple segments by max characters first, then submitted to large model for segmentation.
full_text_tooltip: Use entire document as parent block for direct retrieval. Note: For performance reasons, text exceeding 10,000 tokens will be automatically truncated.
paragraph_tooltip: This mode splits text into paragraphs based on separators and max chunk length, using split text as parent block for retrieval.
generate_knowledge_graph_tooltip: After file chunking, all chunks will be used to generate knowledge graph, improving complex question reasoning capability.
